name: OCKContactButton
desc: A button that initiates contact, which displays a label and image.

items.name: init(type: OCKContactButton.Type)
items.desc: Creates a new contact button with a specific type.

items.name: let contentStackView: OCKStackView
items.desc: A view that contains the button’s content, and arranges its children vertically.

items.name: let imageView: UIImageView
items.desc: An image view for the contact, located above the title label.

items.name: let label: OCKLabel
items.desc: The button’s title label, located under the button’s image.

items.name: enum OCKContactButton.Type
items.desc: The types of action that initiates contact, and determine the label text and image to use in the button.

items.name: func style() -> OCKStyler
items.desc: Returns an object’s custom style, the first parent with a custom style, or the default style.

items.name: func styleChildren()
items.desc: Updates the style of the child views.
